EmailTemplate.subject: Your November Issue of Customer Connect is Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CUSTOMER CONNECT NOVEMBER 2019
Happy Thanksgiving from your Customer and Product Support team!
This month, I’ll highlight the field service engineer team and latest profile, the technical support video of the month and other pertinent customer support updates. As always, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact me. Did You Know?
This Season We’re Thankful for our Support Heroes With 130-some field service engineers globally, our support heroes are committed to solving your toughest technical aviation challenges. Whether its answering questions, troubleshooting complex issues or deploying to a hangar, these heroes take a personal interest in creating the best support experience for our operators. Meet the team of experts dedicated to solving our customers’ technical issues on business and general aviation aircraft. Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/field-service-engineers-americas?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]>
Field Service Engineer Profile: Jack Farley Just Listen to this Engineer’s Secret to Success A former welder, machinist, and aircraft and power plant mechanic, Jack Farley knows how to use his hands on the job. But in his current role as a senior field service engineer at Honeywell. Jack relies most often on his ears. Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/11/just-listen-to-this-engineer-s-secret-to-success?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]>
Sun Never Sets on Honeywell Technical Support Technical support is all about creating a great customer experience – every time. Honeywell is working to provide business aviation customers with better, faster, more responsive service, while still maintaining the personal touch that has been so much a part of Honeywell’s character over the years. Read More. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/11/sun-never-sets-on-honeywell-technical-support?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]>
Video Training Resources at your Fingertips – AERO TV For this month’s video segment, I would like to highlight the AERO TV Training hub. AERO TV is an extensive library of technical training videos can help you stay up-to-date on the latest tools and techniques for maintaining the Honeywell equipment on your aircraft. Learn more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/videos?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]>
Honeywell Forecasts 7,600 New Business Jet Deliveries over Next Decade Valued at $248 Billion The business jet industry is expected to see strong growth in the short to medium term, supported by several new airplane models coming to the market, according to Honeywell's 28th annual Global Business Aviation Outlook. The Global Business Aviation Outlook forecasts up to 7,600 new business jet deliveries worth $248 billion from 2020 to 2029, down 1 to 2 percentage points from the 2018 10-year forecast. Read more. <[[https://www.honeywell.com/en-us/newsroom/pressreleases/2019/10/honeywell-forecasts-7600-new-business-jet-deliveries-over-next-decade-valued-at-248-billion?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]> Jazmin A Meza
Customer Support Manager Mobile: + 52 686-119-3062 Email: Jazmin.Meza@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Jazmin.Meza@Honeywell.com]]>
